name: gridissimo-converter
description:
Generate grid styles via gridissimo.jamillazarev.com


Usage

  • Generate grids using https://gridissimo.jamillazarev.com/
  • Click "For Figma" in the upper right corner
  • Run the plugin, Paste & press "Generate styles"


Keep in mind

  • A short link, properties & CSS will be attached to style in the description.
  • The plugin knows what you have already generated â€“ you don't need to reconnect the styles if you don't change names. Just paste the new URL into the plugin.
